comments:
In a java project which has the SWT Liabrary added, create a new Visual Class 
which extends the SWT composite.
The following exception gets thrown during the creation...

We (the whole team) needs to discuss/design how to handle extending Composite.
For the Beta, we will not support it even though it's still in the New Visual
Class wizard. I pulled it out for VE M2 and will hopefully have it resolved for
1.0.0.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 70105 ***
